title: Cerebral Eruption
description: Target opponent reveals the top card of their library. Cerebral Eruption deals damage equal to the revealed card’s mana value to that player and each creature that player controls. If a land card is revealed this way, return Cerebral Eruption to its owner’s hand.

title: Redcap Melee
description: Redcap Melee deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If a nonred permanent is dealt damage this way, you sacrifice a land.

title: Seshiro the Anointed Avatar
description: At the beginning of the game, choose a creature type. Creatures you control, creature spells you control, and creature cards you own in any zone other than the battlefield or the stack have the chosen type in addition to their other types.

title: Stonework Packbeast
description: Stonework Packbeast is also a Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.{2}: Add one mana of any color.

title: Odric, Lunarch Marshal
description: At the beginning of each combat, creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn if a creature you control has first strike. The same is true for flying, deathtouch, double strike, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, skulk, trample, and vigilance.

title: Descend upon the Sinful
description: Exile all creatures.Delirium— Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

title: Dragon's Claw
description: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

title: Griffin Rider
description: As long as you control a Griffin creature, Griffin Rider gets +3/+3 and has flying.

title: Gwendlyn Di Corci
description: {T}: Target player discards a card at random. Activate only during your turn.

title: Shockmaw Dragon
description: FlyingWhenever Shockmaw Dragon deals combat damage to a player, it deals 1 damage to each creature that player controls.

title: Grave Birthing
description: Devoid(This card has no color.)Target opponent exiles a card from their graveyard. You create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has “Sacrifice this creature: Add{C}.”Draw a card.

title: Curiosity Crafter
description: FlyingYou have no maximum hand size.Whenever a creature token you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

title: Carrion Wurm
description: Whenever Carrion Wurm attacks or blocks, any player may exile three cards from their graveyard. If a player does, Carrion Wurm assigns no combat damage this turn.

title: Merchant Raiders
description: Whenever Merchant Raiders or another Pirate enters the battlefield under your control, tap up to one target creature. That creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s untap step for as long as you control Merchant Raiders.

title: Gone Missing
description: Put target permanent on top of its owner’s library.Investigate.(Create a colorless Clue artifact token with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

title: Kitesail Scout
description: Flying

title: Halo Hunter
description: Intimidate(This creature can’t be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)When Halo Hunter enters the battlefield, destroy target Angel.

title: Desert Cerodon
description: Cycling{R}({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

title: Indigo Faerie
description: Flying{U}: Target permanent becomes blue in addition to its other colors until end of turn.

title: Akoum Stonewaker
description: Landfall— Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay{2}{R}. If you do, create a 3/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step.

title: Tezzeret, Betrayer of Flesh Emblem
description: Whenever an artifact you control becomes tapped, draw a card.

title: Ray of Command
description: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the creature, tap it.

title: Jund Panorama
description: {T}: Add{C}.{1},{T}, Sacrifice Jund Panorama: Search your library for a basic Swamp, Mountain, or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

title: Hero of Goma Fada
description: Rally— Whenever Hero of Goma Fada or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

title: Daxos, Blessed by the Sun
description: Daxos’s toughness is equal to your devotion to white.(Each{W}in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)Whenever another creature you control enters the battlefield or dies, you gain 1 life.

title: Cathodion
description: When Cathodion dies, add{C}{C}{C}.

title: Dwarven Hammer
description: When Dwarven Hammer enters the battlefield, you may pay{2}. If you do, create a 2/1 red Dwarf Berserker creature token, then attach Dwarven Hammer to it.Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample.Equip{3}

title: Tangle Asp
description: Whenever Tangle Asp blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

title: Psychic Overload
description: Enchant permanentWhen Psychic Overload enters the battlefield, tap enchanted permanent.Enchanted permanent doesn’t untap during its controller’s untap step.Enchanted permanent has “Discard two artifact cards: Untap this permanent.”

title: Renegade Demon
description: “Have you ever cornered a wounded vampire? That’s a walk in the cathedral garden in comparison.”—Tristen, Cathar Marshal

title: Akroan Conscriptor
description: Heroic— Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Conscriptor, gain control of another target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

title: Titania's Song
description: Each noncreature artifact loses all abilities and becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value. If Titania’s Song leaves the battlefield, this effect continues until end of turn.

title: Kruin Outlaw
description: First strikeAt the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Kruin Outlaw.

title: Phyrexian Dreadnought
description: TrampleWhen Phyrexian Dreadnought enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice any number of creatures with total power 12 or greater.

title: Terror of Mount Velus
description: Flying, double strikeWhen Terror of Mount Velus enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn.

title: Shifting Sliver
description: Slivers can’t be blocked except by Slivers.

title: Tolaria West
description: Tolaria West enters the battlefield tapped.{T}: Add{U}.Transmute{1}{U}{U}({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with mana value 0, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

title: Worn Powerstone
description: Worn Powerstone enters the battlefield tapped.{T}: Add{C}{C}.

title: Gloom Sower
description: Whenever Gloom Sower becomes blocked by a creature, that creature’s controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

title: Aerial Responder
description: Flying, vigilance, lifelink

title: Celestial Force
description: At the beginning of each upkeep, you gain 3 life.

title: Keskit, the Flesh Sculptor
description: {T}, Sacrifice three other artifacts and/or creatures: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.Partner(You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

title: Orzhov Cluestone
description: {T}: Add{W}or{B}.{W}{B},{T}, Sacrifice Orzhov Cluestone: Draw a card.

title: Prophetic Ravings
description: Enchant creatureEnchanted creature has haste and “{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.”

title: Call to the Grave
description: At the beginning of each player’s upkeep, that player sacrifices a non-Zombie creature.At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Call to the Grave.

title: Oketra's Monument
description: White creature spells you cast cost{1}less to cast.Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token with vigilance.

title: Runaway Steam-Kin
description: Whenever you cast a red spell, if Runaway Steam-Kin has fewer than three +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on Runaway Steam-Kin.Remove three +1/+1 counters from Runaway Steam-Kin: Add{R}{R}{R}.

title: Peace and Quiet
description: Destroy two target enchantments.

title: Crosis's Attendant
description: {1}, Sacrifice Crosis’s Attendant: Add{U}{B}{R}.

title: Ghave, Guru of Spores
description: Ghave, Guru of Spores enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it.{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.{1}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
